Awesome upload! And on the lines of Comedy Central shows with short lifespans, I don't suppose you know where I can find Straight Plan for the Gay Man? I'm pretty sure they only aired three episodes, but I thought those episodes were a riot.

Too bad the version of "Safari Day" here doesn't have the original "Porn For Kids" segment, but I guess that's OK.  It would've been nice though to have had those kids shout "WE WANT PORN!  YEAAAHH!" from that.
